body:
Just hot reload the App and it doesnt go beyond loading screen


Android Studio `Bumblebee | 2021.1.1 Patch 2` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 65.2.2` • Dart plugin `211.7811`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

## Exception

null

